description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Dutch and German Schools. An account of the present state of education in Holland, Belgium and the German States, with a view to the practical steps which should be taken for improving ... the means of popular instruction in Great Britain and Ireland" Author: Hickson, W. E. (William Edward) Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 722.e.36." Page: 9 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1840 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001678919 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life.
